website_summaries.verdict: A whole-grain option that still has a delicious flavor and fun shape kids love.
pros: Since more parents are choosing whole grain foods for their kids, users love this option for feeling good about the snacks in their homes
Some users say the whole grain version tastes slightly different and less salty than the original version, but overall they still enjoy them just as much
cons: This style of packaging does not have a way to seal it, so it is not convenient for traveling

customer_reviews.title: Ummmm YES!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why I measured the box. I must have been bored. Anyway, this is an awesome deal though, I'm very serious. These are the regular size bags that you get at Dollar General for over $2.00 a bag. These are cheaper plus if you have prime, you get free shipping. Mine were within 3 days. You can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: HeidiTop Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: Crunchy and yummy
customer_reviews.text: What can I say more than delicious, crunchy goldfish! I ordered these January 2020 and they came with a sell by date of 9/20/20. Although I’m sure we will have them gone in a couple weeks. They are crunchy and fresh and my kids love them. One thing I noticed an interesting aftertaste almost like when food is stored in a cheap plastic zipper bag and then it tastes like the bag. These kind of had an after flavor like that. We buy goldfish all the time and I haven’t experienced that before. My kids still ate a bunch of them and enjoyed them. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: #1Mom

customer_reviews.title: product had an expiration date about a month from when i received item
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this was listed when i purchased the item or not but when i received the box i saw that all of the bags of goldfish have an expiration date of late september. i was a little upset because i was hoping to have them a little longer than that before i am going to have to toss them if they arent eaten
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Seiler

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great Donation
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to donate to my daughter's Kindergarten class. I figured the six bags might stay fresher than the one giant box and the six packs should last a while for a kindergarten class snack. Plus if they get bored they don't have to feel obligated to finish a large box they can move on to something else and come back to them later. Item ships in the package box if you don't choose to ship in an Amazon box so if that is something that bothers you - heads up!
customer_reviews.author: FaerieTxn

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for your Money
customer_reviews.text: Getting these crackers this way is so much cheaper than buying the bags in the store. My husband eats his way through them really quickly so keeping them fresh is usually not a problem. I'd love it if they made it into a resealable bag at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan K. (Books2lovenow)

customer_reviews.title: Dates were good and the crackers were fresh.
customer_reviews.text: First thing I checked when I received the Pepperidge Farm Goldfish Cheddar Crackers was to check the date. Then to see if the product was undamaged. The dates were set for early next year so that was good. The packages were undamaged. Upon opening and tasting the crackers, they were indeed good. I will buy again. With kids in the house, they went fast.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Rossman

customer_reviews.title: Crunchy Cheese Fish and I Love Them
customer_reviews.text: I’m addicted to these things and I’m so glad I can buy them in bulk. I love the initial crunch and there’s the perfect amount of salt and cheese in every bite! TMI but I take medications at night that make me feel hungry no matter how much dinner I had and these are the perfect snack when I can’t ignore the annoying stomach growls any longer. I hope the company pays its employees well because I sure do pay enough for what amounts to mass produced cheese flavored fish-shaped crackers.
customer_reviews.author: regina

customer_reviews.title: Picture is deceiving
customer_reviews.text: There are only two in the box, so the picture is so misleading! I had 3 kids to but for and I was so excited to see this package with 3 in it! But disappointed in opening the box to find only 2 packages, so now I have to go buy another one!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha N Botten

customer_reviews.title: Makes stocking up on snacks easier
customer_reviews.text: My kids love Goldfish but ingetntir dnof buying small bags that don't last. These 30 oz packs are a great buy at a great price. They last a while and Amazon always ships them carefully so there is no crushed boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Crispy Crunch Snack
customer_reviews.text: The last time I can remember eating Pepper Ridge Farm Gold Fish was in the early 1970's! They were delicious than as they are now. The Extra Cheddar flavor has just the right amount so as to be not overbearing. Each fish cracker is delectable and savory. If I'm not paying attention I can consume a full bag in minutes! (Glad I bought 6!). It seems most snack makers are watching their profit margin. That usually means "tweaking" a favored recipe usually to the disappointment of consumers. Not Gold Fish. I hope they stay this way always.
customer_reviews.author: ojait2Top Contributor: Welding

customer_reviews.title: expiration date 3 months from purchased
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know if this was done intentionally but I received six bags all will expire in the beginning of August 2020. Had I known I was purchasing so many that had to be eating in such a short timeframe I would not have purchased this box. These are the normal size bags that you would find in a grocery store. So not sure if I really got a good coat value if they have to be eaten so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for easter basket gift giving!
customer_reviews.text: You won't believe why I purchased two huge boxes of these. My grandson loves them and carries around the huge box his mother had purchased a month ago, nibbling on them constantly. He ran out. He's a bit OCD-Sheldon when it comes to certain things he'll eat. He gets hooked a particular thing and certain flavor, and that's it. So, I purchased both of these to place one in his easter basket along with his other "chosen" goodies and batting gloves. Stowing the other for later when he runs out of his to-go-to snack. Cheaper than local brick and mortar store!
customer_reviews.author: Miss ReadTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: IF you like cheese flavor - and goldfish - this is the item for you!
customer_reviews.text: IF you like cheese flavor - and goldfish - this is the item for you! The reasonably sized sacks are a perfect balance between keeping the contents fresh and buying enough to get a decent price/oz. These snacks are tasty and not bland non-descript flavor of the regular cheddar goldfish! Arrived promptly and the best price for more than 39 oz. without having to buy 5 HUGE boxes.
customer_reviews.author: gbdusmc

customer_reviews.title: Rather pay more to get the individual packet one.
customer_reviews.text: The flavor tastes the same but I rather pay more to get the individual packets. First, my kids are young children, they cannot open the box to pour the goldfish out by themself or if they are trying to get it out, the whole box will come out. Secondly, I need to pour it out in the ziplock bags for them. It costs me more to use ziplock bags. Last, the seal of the paper box is not close enough, it makes the goldfish inside soft and smell of oil after opening. I don’t recommend this product even though it is a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Dunxalon

customer_reviews.title: Missing One, Otherwise Okay
customer_reviews.text: I didn't actually get to try them yet (by the time they arrived, I started a diet again ha) so I can't vouch for what's inside. I'll update later if anything is wrong (wrong flavor inside or whatnot). There was one problem off the bat, however. And that's the fact that 6 bags of goldfish came and ONE of them was empty. Like.. standing upright, full of air, sealed, but empty. Very odd... otherwise, they look like 5 normal bags of goldfish. If they are what they say they are, then they'll be great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great taste not too salty
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome one of my favorite snack to eat on around the house and it great deal for two boxes of theses because you would pay that for one very pleased with product the taste is very good and not too salty. I bought this a couple of times will continue to buy more for myself and as gift for friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: kiarakewna

customer_reviews.title: Hole in one bag!
customer_reviews.text: These are fresh but expiration date is just a few weeks away and one of the bags had a hole in it. It looked like someone punctured it with their finger when packing it into the box. So I'm throwing that package in the trash. But the others are ok. I usually buy these goldfish in the larger cartons and they usually have a longer expiration date. So I may not buy the goldfish packed in these paper bags next time. I really do like these for a snack!
customer_reviews.author: Tuxedo Cat

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite...
customer_reviews.text: I love Goldfish as a snack so I generally have them around the house all the time. Last time I ordered, they did not have the regular ones in stock so I decided to give these ones a try. They are meh...they taste synthetic (more than the originals at least). I also don't like the dusting that they have because you have to wash your hands after eating a few. They tasted more like Cheetos than goldfish.
customer_reviews.author: John Ash

customer_reviews.title: Expires within 3 months !
customer_reviews.text: Bought a big bulk for the price, and expected the expiration dates to be fresh. The ones I received expires within 3 months! Asked for replacement and still, same expiration date. Won’t buy again. Be caution on the expiration dates!
customer_reviews.author: mewmew

customer_reviews.title: So so so yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't like goldfish. I have my whole family eating these as a snack :). I love having the big size carton in the house for quick and easy snacks. They have great flavor and crunch without being a greasy fried treat. In my opinion, they stay fresh and do not go stale in the packaging. I do place a club after closing the opening to insure no air gets in. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tigers

customer_reviews.title: Fishies for weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Best deal on our favorite snack! Watch for the price drops (you can catch it under $7) and stock up! I’ve ordered multiple times. Product is always fresh with a long expiration date. Always ships quick and arrives before expected delivery in perfect condition, safely double boxed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki S.

customer_reviews.title: not happy with these
customer_reviews.text: These were awful. I like the regular version so much better. These are salter and have some type of grainy coating on them so I had to wipe my hand off every time I took some. I only ordered these to get the same thing as the regular but with more cheese flavor- but that's not what happened. Ill give the 5 packages away and buy the regular again. Lesson learned!
customer_reviews.author: The Lilac Poet

customer_reviews.title: Goldfish is our favorite
customer_reviews.text: These are one of our favorite snacks. I buy the larger container and package in snack size zip lock bags for everyone to grab on the go. Goldfish is the perfect snack for anyone!! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Didn't they used to be more orange?
customer_reviews.text: Maybe this is more of a mandella effect. But I swear Goldfish Crackers used to be more orange. I am thinking, if anything they used to use dyes, but the world may never know. Unless there are others out there who feel the same. This two pack is an amazing value. Considering how much just one of these normally costs at the local superstore. Now I wish i did subscribe and save
customer_reviews.author: We Used That

customer_reviews.title: :) I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.text: I love goldfish. My kids love goldfish. We go through about 3 packs every 2 weeks. The resealable pouches are hard to find at my local store because they sell out quickly, so I purchased 3 on here instead. The quality was exceptional, no broken crackers and tasted great. Also wasn't past the expiration date. I would definitely repurchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kamille Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: These individual bags cost $2.50 on the outside, so ordering the six pack gets you 6 bags for the price of 4. $5 isnt exactly game changing money, but it's still something, and IMO, makes this a very worthwhile purchase, value-wise. The quality is just as would be expected with Goldfish crackers - crisp, crunchy, fresh, and tasty. Great snack foods.
customer_reviews.author: O. Albretsen

customer_reviews.title: Prefer regular cheddar flavor
customer_reviews.text: These goldfish taste good, but are a little disappointing overall. I was expecting goldfish that had a more concentrated cheesy flavor (like cheez-its). But instead, these are regular goldfish crackers with extra cheese powder on it. I wasn't expecting that. They taste good, but not what I was hoping for. Also, they're a little messier than regular goldfish.
customer_reviews.author: AMZ customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: 2 gallon sized containers for this price is awesome! BUT I really wish they would sell the whole wheat ones like this so I felt better about giving them to my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Mommabear

customer_reviews.title: Really worth paying for!
customer_reviews.text: I got these two big cartons of Pepperidge Farm Goldfish Crackers a few days ago for $8 and some change. My daughter and I really loves it and it was my first time to purchase packs as big as these. It was truly worth paying for, not to mention that it is a steal deal and you cannot beat the price. It is good until 09/06/2020 and so we still have enough time to consume it all.
customer_reviews.author: kenzo_gal

customer_reviews.title: I am so Weak
customer_reviews.text: I love these things but will never again buy them in this quantity. They are almost as bad as potato chips and I simply don't have the will power to consume them in moderation.
customer_reviews.author: Hoosier

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: We get these on subscribe and save which makes them way cheaper than our local grocery chain. We take them for our daughter's school for snack as well as enjoy them as a family. I also love that the makers of goldfish do not use any artificial color in their products, which is good for our family since my daughter has a red dye allergy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Always fresh, every time
customer_reviews.text: These always come in good condition. I like this flavor, particularly, because the other cheese flavors tend to be greasy and salty, compared to these. They're a good stand in when I want something crunchy and salty like a chip. As long as the quality holds up, I'll continue to purchase these.
customer_reviews.author: HS Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Caught these on sale and I have a preschooler so it's a no brainer! The date was sooner than I would like on them, but he is up to the challenge!
customer_reviews.author: S. Sinnwell

customer_reviews.title: Check the expiration!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on Prime Day and ended up with 3 bags that expired a month after I received them. I bought them for me two young kids and there is no way we can eat that many gold fish in a month. I'm slightly disappointed, but I'm glad I atleast got a deal on them!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Crispy fresh
customer_reviews.text: Got the rainbow fish bag of six. All were in good condition (not smashed) and all were fresh and crispy tasting. The expiration date was a year from now. I even gave a bag or two as a sort of 'thinking of you gift', and they loved them. Going to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: oldnabs

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: Why throw money away on single-serving lunchbox sizes when you can buy this for the same price and fill up a small tupperware container for months. On top of sparing the planet all that extra plastic waste, you'll be spending less than half as much on Goldfish. Easiest way to cut food costs out of the budget.
customer_reviews.author: Zach G.

customer_reviews.title: Produced with genetic engineering GMO
customer_reviews.text: Just found out these are GMOs for our kids so sad bc most kids love these snacks but the company only cares for their pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Nourina

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD DEAL!
customer_reviews.text: This is another thing I can buy through Amazon and don’t have to go look for at the grocery store. Incredible deal. They are great snacks. My daughter munches on these every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super deal and my fav go to snack
customer_reviews.text: Such a great deal! I love these cracker and have eaten them for years. Package arrived on time, well packaged, fresh and yummy. I kept one box and gave the other to room mate. I recommend product and seller. Snack on!
customer_reviews.author: kelly jones

customer_reviews.title: Crunchy
customer_reviews.text: All the bags were sealed and not damaged I normally eat lots of these crackers I finished one bag but it was really tough to chew for an odd reason my jaw was sore and it made my bottom teeth throb that doesn’t happen to me before
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Best snack ever for all ages.
customer_reviews.text: We got a good deal on this and me and my mom love this stuff. Sure, we're on a budget but we gotten a good deal on this and it's one of the kings of snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sending to school
customer_reviews.text: Having these arrive 1x a month was perfect for sending to school for class snack. Now, we have them at home.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra A.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Picked up this product for a great price! Very happy I’m able to provide my son’s class with a yummy, kid-approved snack they will love. Initially it was back ordered, but arrived earlier than the anticipated date! Super happy and would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Jess18

customer_reviews.title: Read below, please.
customer_reviews.text: Simply put...ÜBER DELICIOUSNESS!!! Goldfish rock, and if you cannot handle the bag, I will gladly take it from you. :)
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting crunchy snack!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute great value for the money. My two year old loves goldfish snacks. I have two older boys that are also enjoying them. They are very crunchy and fresh. Great flavor. I love the box keeps them from getting all smashed :)
customer_reviews.author: leigh kov

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the six pack of goldfish crackers. What a terrific price. They were packaged very well. All individual packages had clearly stamped expiration date, so I knew they would be fresh. Will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn’t love goldfish?!
customer_reviews.text: My whole family LOVES goldfish. They eat them as often as possible so when they had 2 30oz containers on sale for a little over $7 of course I had to buy them! That’s cheaper then the price of 1 in the store! They came quick and in date. Yum yum yum!
customer_reviews.author: leelee danii

customer_reviews.title: Ok-
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, these seemed lighter and had less flavor than the big box we normally buy. (Is that even possible?). It was a great deal, but wouldn’t buy again. Maybe I’m just picky. This would probably be great if you have young ones on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Smabbs

customer_reviews.title: Great snack treat that's better than ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've tried the whole grain cheddar goldfish and they're great. They seem a little thinner and crispier than the originals and I love that. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: A review
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to review this so that I can clear out the request to review. This is exactly what it says it is and that is pretty much it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummm
customer_reviews.text: Yay Goldfish! Me and my 13 yr old daughter love goldfish. I have eaten them since I was a kid. This was a great value. Came fast and was packaged very well. One for her, one for me. This is how I’ll be buying my goldfish from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: What a great deal! With two young children, we go through goldfish way too quickly in our house. These have been awesome! I put a box into a "cereal saver" container to keep them fresh and it's worked great!
customer_reviews.author: L. Botto

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Splendid!
customer_reviews.text: These fish crackers are a go to staple in my house of 5 boys that enjoy their snacks! They arrived very fresh and once in a while I stock up on them when they go on sale here all while using Subscribe and Save. For the wife and I, we love them in our soups.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great, Packaged nicely, and the price was even better!
customer_reviews.author: My Name

customer_reviews.title: I’m a big kid at heart
customer_reviews.text: What can I say... I’m addicted to these crunchy cheesy little fish crackers. I had to take advantage of the great sale they had for these here on amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Girl

customer_reviews.title: Worth the wait
customer_reviews.text: These are just the same as any other goldfish. Shipping took a long time, but I paid for two boxes for the price of one at the grocery store. Worth the wait
customer_reviews.author: Amber M.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Just like I remember in my childhood. It's a great snack for the office if you're a "bored" eater. It doesnt contain AS MUCH junk as chips.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT taste like xtra cheddar
customer_reviews.text: These taste like the regular goldfish which for us are too bland. I will not be purchasing again. I am not sure why these taste so different from the ones at the supermarket.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nouri

customer_reviews.title: My grandsons loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Whenever these deals come up I order them and have them shipped right to my daughter for my grandsons! They get a "present" in the mail from grandma and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: Ummm... Who doesn't love goldfish???
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these little chedder fishies!!! The only thing I can complain about is that I can never eat just one... or one hundred, lol!
customer_reviews.author: tamara lynne

customer_reviews.title: Watch expiration date
customer_reviews.text: I got a 6 pack for $5. It’s a great deal however they expire in two weeks. We are a family of 3. It would be great for bigger families.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Enjoy
customer_reviews.text: The size is easy to handle for all ages. They have a very cheesey taste, and are always good to have on hand for gatherings of family & friends.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Angel

customer_reviews.title: was like bogo
customer_reviews.text: great price! Just didn't feel they were as fresh as if I bought them in the store. Maybe because we didn't eat them as fast because there were so many. Great price still!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Di Swan

customer_reviews.title: Received the wrong kind
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Xtra Blast kind and got multicolored. Kids were disappointed, but with everything going on we appreciate having them at all. I just would have liked a heads up.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha F.

customer_reviews.title: No smashed goldfish!
customer_reviews.text: I got a great deal on these and they are lasting forever. I love the large cartons that are easy to pour and the crackers don’t get smashed like in the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Fresh tasting and great snack for grandkids
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can get six packages that are reasonably priced. The expiration date was about six weeks from when I received them.
customer_reviews.author: Jane L.

customer_reviews.title: Classic snack food, still love them
customer_reviews.text: Ate these in bars for decades. Those days are past, now I munch while watching TV. Low calorie and fairly low fat. Can't beat them.
customer_reviews.author: RGK

customer_reviews.title: It's Goldfish!
customer_reviews.text: It's Goldfish, you know what they are, they are like a crack addiction. Buy them by the big box and they still don't last.
customer_reviews.author: Nalon1

customer_reviews.title: Xtra Cheddar ALL THE WAY
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know that original Goldfish were lacking until we tried xtra cheddar. Less is not more. More is more. More cheddar all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Ginni

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: The freshness was better than a grocery store and the flavor did not change. Packaging made sure they were crushed when they got to me
customer_reviews.author: Rilee Sunday

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and arrived fast
customer_reviews.text: Crackers arrived packaged well and free next day delivery with Prime. They're fresh and taste great. Can't beat that.
customer_reviews.author: Route66Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great Snack
customer_reviews.text: I could eat it all myself and I did (over time). Bought another one for my daughters snacks amd her dad’s belly.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Good fishies
customer_reviews.text: These boxes retail for $8 each at Target so this is a steal!
customer_reviews.author: MRamsey

customer_reviews.title: Great snack!
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with Goldfish! All my little ones love them. They arrived fresh and these will last awhile!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Cashin

customer_reviews.title: goldfish!
customer_reviews.text: it's goldfish! my twins inhale these (i've gotten into the habit too). easier to buy this many of them at a reduced price than getting from Target.
customer_reviews.author: B.F.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I ate like 4 of the 6 bags and wound up giving the other two away. Good but very addicting crackers.
customer_reviews.author: Kippy

customer_reviews.title: Very fresh
customer_reviews.text: Amazon has great price and fresh goldfish . Though one box was opened when we got it . I think shipping issue
customer_reviews.author: David Klan

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Goldfish are our “go to” snack and two boxes for almost the price of one in local stores? Just couldn’t pass them up!
customer_reviews.author: klutzrob

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value when ordered via subscribe and save
customer_reviews.text: Lowest price we’ve been able to find on this great snack that our kids love when we order via subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Sportsman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My kids love gold fish and it saves me money and time when I can order them in bulk from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Classic snack- arrived fresh
customer_reviews.text: Great value- arrived fresh. I wish they would come up with better packaging to keep them fresh once you open the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn J

customer_reviews.title: Stale bag
customer_reviews.text: I love goldfish but there was something wrong with me bag, all of the goldfish were stale.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and best price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Gold Fish.Good deal.I prefer the Cheese Blast better but these are Great.
customer_reviews.author: alex g

customer_reviews.title: Better taste
customer_reviews.text: Love Goldfish crackers! I think the cardboard container goldfish taste better than the bags!
customer_reviews.author: m. johnson

customer_reviews.title: Just like from the store
customer_reviews.text: This came really quick, and were super delicious. I brought them on car trips, and they were a great snack to have. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Lula Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Great but addictive !
customer_reviews.text: These are great title crackers, but they become addicted. Too easy to grab a handful. LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel

customer_reviews.title: Gold fish.
customer_reviews.text: Love fish. Tasty Good. And you don’t even need a fishing pole or license!
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: WHERE'S THE CHEESE
customer_reviews.text: Not a hint of cheese, just dry cracker and salt. Don't waste your money. READ INGREDEANCES!
customer_reviews.author: happy camper

customer_reviews.title: Kids favy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good quality and the kids favorite flavor we now keep these stocked at home
customer_reviews.author: VIVA STEED

customer_reviews.title: My opinion
customer_reviews.text: there fishy crackers for crying out loud if you’ve never tried them buy some they’re just as good now as they were 20 years ago
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Tasteless
customer_reviews.text: I got this product yesterday and am a huge goldfish eater but this one hits differently. I couldn't taste it the goldfish and only tasted salt. I switched boxes but it still tasted stale with alot of salt. I don't know y but I definitely didn't like this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Edumanichukwu

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Go-to snack
customer_reviews.text: If I can be patient, y'all are my go-to to get my snacks in abundance. Plus, it's cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: jennieff bianca snowden

customer_reviews.title: Taste like regular, not “flavor blasted”
customer_reviews.text: These goldfish did not taste like the “flavor-blasted” kind. Several of us tried them who eat these and could taste the difference. Pepperidge Farm should know there is a quality control issue as several of the bags tasted like regular Goldfish.
customer_reviews.author: JGJ

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves these.
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves these snacks and this is a much better deal than picking them up at the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Griffin

customer_reviews.title: I love fishy crackers and so does all my friends and family.
customer_reviews.text: You can never have too many fishy crackers lying around. I have not met anyone who does not like them. I've tried a few generics and I keep coming back to the real deal. Now I can buy them in bulk. What's not to love.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger88

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE goldfish. They would eat these all day if I let them. But I like how big of a box and it's cheaper than going to the store. The flavor is good and they're fresh.
customer_reviews.author: DeRiah M.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on goldfish
customer_reviews.text: I half expected the to be expired but they were good for several months! Taste great! My kids love them. Very good deal too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Consistent Brand
customer_reviews.text: Have been buying this brand and flavor for a while, boys love it.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: We love goldfish in this house!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived on time we got it for a great price and it is delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best value compared to grocery stores
customer_reviews.text: I haven't actually tried them yet but it was a great value! 6 packs for about $10 when there individually marked at $2.50?! I got at least one pack for free!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

product_meta.title: Pepperidge Farm Goldfish Baked with Whole Grain Cheddar Crackers, 39.6 oz. Box, 6-count 6.6 oz. Bags
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Whole Grain| Size:6.6 Ounce (Pack of 6)About Pepperidge Farm: For us, baking is more than a job. It's a real passion. Each day, our bakers take the time to make every cookie, pastry, cracker, and loaf of bread the best way they know how by using simple, quality ingredients. Baking requires knowledge of the craft, a spirit of exploration and, inspired ideas. At Pepperidge Farm, we have been honing and perfecting our chosen craft for generations, and our bakers care deeply about what that means. It's the little things that make simple food taste special. We believe in doing things right, and we just happen to love it.

The Snack that Smiles Back: When it comes to Goldfish crackers, you can feel good about serving your favorite snacks. All of our cheese varieties, like cheddar, are baked with real cheese, and Goldfish crackers are made with no artificial preservatives or flavors.

Everyone loves Goldfish crackers – they're tasty and fun!
feature_bullets: Playful crackers baked with a smile
Cheddar flavor, baked with real cheese
When it comes to Goldfish crackers, you can feel good about serving your favorite snacks

specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
